verses.1: Tua ciangin leitungah thuman loin a kigamtatnate khempeuh ka ngaihsunkik leuleu hi. Nenniamna a thuak mite kap uh a, ahi zongin kuamah in amaute hehnem lo uh hi. A nengniam mite thahat lua uh ahih manin kuamah in thuk ngam lo hi.
verses.2: A hing lai mite sangin a si khin sa mite hampha zaw ka sa hi.
verses.3: Mihing a hong piang nai lo, hih leitung gitlohna teng a mu nai lote hampha zaw lai sawnsawn uh hi.
verses.4: Mi khatlekhat, hauh nop man a kidemna hangin nakpi tak a na kisem ahihna ka mu hi. Hih zong a mawknapi hi a, huihpi nung delh mah tawh kibang bek hi.
verses.5: Mihaite in na sem loin a khut zepin om uh a, a tawpna ah gil kialin sih lawh uh hi.
verses.6: Nakpi takin na sem a, a mawknapi ahi ding, khut nih dim sangin lungsim nuamin khut khat dim neihna hoih zaw hi.
verses.7: Nuntakna sungah a mawknapi ahi thudang khat ka mu leuleu hi.
verses.8: Mi khat in tapa ahi a, sanggam ahi zongin nei lo napi-in, a tawntungin na semin a neihsa tawh lungkim hun nei thei lo hi. Kua adingin gimpi-in na sem a, a ututin ta hoh lo ahi hiam? Hih zong a mawknapi mah, a dahhuai nuntakna khat ahi hi.
verses.9: Mi khat sangin mi nih hoih zaw hi; amauʼ sepna thaman a tam zaw ngah uh hi.
verses.10: Bang hang hiam cih leh khat cimawh leh a khat in huh a, mi khat guak pen cimawh zenzen leh a huh ding om lo ahih manin a dahhuai pha mahmah ahi hi.
verses.11: Khua a dam ciangin mi nih lum khawm leh khua lum hi; khat guak bangci khualum theih ding ahi hiam?
verses.12: Mi khat bek hileh zawh nop kisa a, nih pha leh kizo zo lo hi. Zang thum a kiheek khauhual bawh sat hak hi.
verses.13: Miʼ thugen a sang thei nawn lo, teek leh hai a thuah kumpipa sangin zawng napi-in a pil tangval khat hoih zaw hi.
verses.14: Mi khat pen thong panin suakta-in kumpi suak thei a, zawng napi-in ama gam sungah kumpi suak thei hi.
verses.15: Hih leitungah mi khempeuhʼ thu ka ngaihsun a, tua mite lak panin kumpipaʼ za a luah ding khangno mi khat a om lam ka phawk hi.
verses.16: Kumpipaʼ uk ding mite sim zawh lohin tam a, ahi zongin amah a sih ciangin ama nasepna hangin a lungdam khat beek om lo hi. Hih pen a mawkna taktak, huihpi nung delh bang bek ahi hi.
